item.title: Wicked Subtly Set Up Part 2's Big Fiyero Twist With Musical Change
item.description: The 2024 Wicked movie may have subtly set up the big Fiyero twist in Part 2 by changing a detail from the original musical, adding to one subplot.

item.title: The Dark Tower 2017 Ending Explained: Why Walter Wants To Destroy The Tower
item.description: 2017's The Dark Tower adpation is stuffed full of Stephen King lore in a 95-minute runtime, with the ending leaving potential questions for audiences.

item.title: Andy Serkis Reveals His First Reaction To Lord Of The Rings Role: "Can't You Get Me Up For Something Decent?"
item.description: Exclusive: Andy Serkis reveals he was initially disappointed in the role Peter Jackson wanted him to play in The Lord of the Rings trilogy.
